backend/main.mo: Canister actor defining roles, credential validation, Kaizen and Observation types, storage maps, and maintenance/auth logic with mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking logout‑button requirement to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering routing, auth, UI components, and dashboard features.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for root-level CSS.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines full TanStack Router configuration with auth and role guards for all app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth wrapper enforcing login, admin setup, and maintenance-mode logic before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role guard that restricts access to admin or manager pages and shows an access‑denied UI when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyState: Reusable empty‑state component displaying message, optional image, and action button.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenAss: Manager UI for assigning a Kaizen to a department and required tools with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenDec: Provides approve/reject actions for a Kaizen item with required comments and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenPho: Displays uploaded Kaizen photos with loading, empty states, and timestamp formatting.
Handles image file selection, validation, upload with progress tracking, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenSta: Renders a status badge based on KaizenStatus with preset labels and variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar showing user info, role-based menus, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple container wrapper providing page layout spacing.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for new users to submit name and create a profile with fixed role.
Sends periodic activity pings when user is active and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLogout.ts: Centralized logout clearing session, cache, and redirecting to login.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching caller’s profile, admin status, and role via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as observations, kaizens, and user-related actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Shows admin setup confirmation and auto-redirects to the dashboard after initialization.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CredentialManag: Admin interface for authorizing, creating, resetting, enabling, and disabling user credentials with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MaintenanceMode: Provides UI to view and toggle system maintenance mode with optimistic updates and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Form for assigning user roles by Principal ID with validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with stats, recent kaizens, and access-denied alerts based on user role.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenDetailPa: Displays detailed Kaizen info and conditionally shows admin panels for decisions, assignments, and photo uploads.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenFormPage: Form for submitting a new Kaizen idea with required field validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenListPage: Displays and filters Kaizen submissions with search, status filters, and role-based visibility.
Provides a form for creating a new Kaizen submission and handles validation and submission.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements credential-based login with role selection, validation, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Displays a maintenance notice and provides a sign-out action clearing identity and cache.
frontend/src/pages/manager/AnalyticsPage: Shows analytics for observations and Kaizens, including totals, approval rates, trends, and top areas.
frontend/src/pages/manager/GapsPage.tsx: Identifies and displays low-activity areas and departments based on recent submissions.
frontend/src/pages/manager/InactivityDas: Displays operators inactive for a configurable number of days and allows CSV export of results.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerProfil: Shows manager profile details, including name, role, login ID, and provides logout and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/manager/OperatorActiv: Displays operator activity with sorting, inactivity calculations, and threshold-based active/inactive counts.
frontend/src/pages/observations/Observat: Shows detailed information for a single observation with metadata and navigation controls.
Provides a form to submit a new observation with validation and mutation handling.
Simplified observation submission page with predefined types and form validation.
Lists observations with filtering, search, admin-aware visibility, and navigation to creation.
frontend/src/pages/operator/OperatorProf: Displays the logged-in operator's profile, role, and logout/back actions.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides analytics helpers for submissions, top areas, approval rates, decision time, and low-activity segments.
frontend/src/utils/credentialInput.ts: Normalizes and validates credential input fields and checks login/password pair validity.
frontend/src/utils/credentialSession.ts: Manages credential-based auth session storage, roles, and access-denied flags.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates and triggers download of CSV files from data arrays.
frontend/src/utils/goBackOrDashboard.ts: Hook that navigates back if possible or redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/loginSelection.ts: Maps backend credential validation errors to safe, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, issues, and notes regarding the authentication redesign and admin credential system.
